name: OurLittleSecret
0:
”Alexa, open Our Little Secret.”
”Tell me a secret.”
”Can you tell me another secret?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: our little secret
des:
Our Little Secret is a fictional peek into the secrets Ashley, a comedienne and part-time mind reader, has learned during her brief interactions with you. Her extra sensory abilities enable her to easily peer into your memories and experience conversations you’ve had, as well as, sounds you’ve heard. These are the sources of the Little Secrets she’ll reveal. Of course, these are entirely fictitious and meant to be fun! 

Her brother, Eric, also a psychic, turned comedy writer is willing to share his own "Deeper Thoughts" based on similar observations made possible by his psychic abilities. Ashley’s “Little Secrets” are typically balanced, coupling somewhat negative observations with positive ones. They are entirely free. Eric’s “Deeper Thoughts” are a bit blunter and require a small, one-time fee to hear. All the responses are entirely fictitious and are meant to be a humorous peak into your world!

If a Little Secret or Deeper Thought seems appropriate to you, it was only a guess!

I hope you enjoy this little spoof!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
